snapshot_name: Real Estate Investor Complete Automation System
use_case: Complete business automation for real estate investor businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Real Estate Investor business owners, real estate professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for real estate investor businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the real estate investor industry.
key_benefits: Industry-specific funnels for real estate investor services
Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Real Estate Investor businesses wanting to automate operations
New real estate investor businesses needing a complete system
Established real estate companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Real Estate Investor Lead Capture Funnel
Real Estate Investor Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Real Estate Investor Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
